flowchart_data.title: Will your chats include sensitive data or will you be collaborating with external guests?
flowchart_data.text: Specifically will include sensitive content, not just discussion around sensitive topics – distinguish between “Change the SSN” and “Change SSN from xxx-xx-xxxx to...”

four_fluencies.title: Solving the Climate Crisis
four_fluencies.blurb: Middlebury transforming our energy system and responding to issues of climate change, social injustice, and the well-being of all.

four_fluencies.title: Analyzing Data
four_fluencies.blurb: Middlebury providing students access to powerful technological tools and supporting their ability to apply them across disciplines for critical exploration.

four_fluencies.title: Transforming Conflict
four_fluencies.blurb: Middlebury’s incubator for research, teaching, and student experiences to shift the dynamics underlying conflict to address divisiveness in society.

four_fluencies.title: Understanding Cultural Difference
four_fluencies.blurb: Middlebury fostering students’ ability to listen, communicate, and take action in communities with a range of linguistic and cultural backgrounds.
